title: S8E18 – "A Monstrous Medley" – Scary Stories Told in the Dark
description:
In this episode of Scary Stories Told in the Dark, we bring you seven spine-chilling tales from author Micah Edwards, performed by host and narrator Otis Jiry, about phantom firefighters, murderous mishaps, cryptic calls, roadway revenants, threatening therapeutics, corrupt cogitations, and loathsome landscapes.


                                   
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
